I've downloaded and played the game for a few hours. There are no viruses/trojans in the torrent and the game is utter crap, borring and buggy.

Tested on: Win7 Ultimate 32bits.

Result: Doesn't work.
There is no readme in english, and probably the game isn't in english either.
Changing compatibility doesn't do a damn thing.
The crack and crack fix don't do a damn thing.
Updating drivers doesn't do a damn thing.
It's not an iso, so most likely there is no installation, and neither is there a way to find out, because everything is chinese and fucking russian.

Recommended course of action: *Delete*, *Sigh*, waste of bandwidth.
